fields.name: Tesla Model 3 Performance 2021
fields.description: Reaching its third year in production, the Tesla Model 3 Performance still excites. With a sub-$60,000 tag, the Model 3 Performance is one of the overall best performing vehicles for the price. Zero to sixty takes just 3.1 seconds, and it can achieve a top speed of 162 mph. As these performance figures are impressive for any car, the Model 3 Performance is a five-seater sedan with a 315-mile range.
fields.list: Range: 315 miles / Drivetrain: AWD / Acceleration: 0-60 in 3.1 seconds
